title: Camila Mendes models a spaghetti strap green mini dress before changing into a zebra print blazer
text:
She's known for playing Veronica Lodge on the beloved teen soap Riverdale originally based on the Archie comics.

And on Wednesday, Camila Mendes looked every bit as gorgeous as her onscreen persona and then some as she modeled two exquisite outfits while on publicity rounds in New York City.

The first look, which she wore for an appearance on Live! With Kelly And Ryan, was a beautiful knit spaghetti strap apple green mini dress with a diamond tassel adornment on the thigh.

Oh, Veronica: On Wednesday, Camila Mendes looked every bit as gorgeous as her onscreen persona Veronica Lodge and then some in New York City

Camila, 25, looked ultra sultry in the statement dress, which showcased the actress's killer figure and long legs.

She completed that look with sparkly strappy heeled sandals.

Later in the day on Wednesday, Camila wore a slightly dressed-down but still beautiful ensemble, which consisted of a green mini skirt, black turtleneck and fabulous zebra print blazer.

Her mini skirt had a faintly academic cheerleader vibe, as it featured white piping at the hem and waist.

Animal print chic: Later on Wednesday, Camila wore a slightly dressed-down but still beautiful ensemble, which consisted of a green mini skirt, black turtleneck and zebra print blazer

Dressed up and down all over town: The Riverdale actress modeled two exquisite outfits while on publicity rounds in the city

The actress chatted on her iPhone as she walked down the street in white Adidas trainers, and hid her eyes behind cat eye shades.

For both ensembles, Mendes carried a black purse with a small strap handle.

Camila has been making the rounds on talk shows, including Tuesday night's episode of Stephen Colbert, in support of Riverdale — which just began its fourth season on The CW this month — as well as a new ad partnership with Secret women's deodorant brand.

One of the topics Mendes covered when she chatted with Kelly Ripa and Ryan Seacrest was what it's been like to work with Ripa's husband, Mark Consuelos, who plays Veronica's father Hiram on Riverdale.

She said it's a pleasure working with him, especially since she knows those shoot days will go smoothly thanks to Mark's professionalism and efficient get-it-done demeanor on set.

Brand ambassador: Camila has been making the rounds on talk shows in support of Riverdale as well as a new ad partnership with Secret women's deodorant

Riverdale returned earlier this month with the heart-wrenching season four premiere that paid tribute to the late Luke Perry, who played patriarch Fred Andrews on the show since it debuted in 2017.

Perry's 90210 costar and love interest Shannen Doherty guest starred on the premiere in tribute to the fallen actor.

Filming for the current season of Riverdale is expected to go into April of 2020.

It's interesting to note that Camila's role as Veronica on the hit show was actually her first role in Hollywood.

Now, along with continuing on Riverdale, Mendes has been hard at work with a role in the upcoming romantic comedy film Palm Springs, which also stars Andy Samberg, Tyler Hoechlin, J.K. Simmons and Cristin Milioti.

She also plays the lead in the upcoming thriller film Windfall, alongside Jessie T. Usher, Jamie Chung, Cam Gigandet, Elliott Gould and Sasha Alexander.
